description: Temporary staging area where newly retrieved sensor data is initially stored before processing. This directory is cleared and repopulated with each data acquisition cycle.
purpose: Provide clean workspace for daily API data retrieval and initial data validation

workflow_role.description: First stage in data processing pipeline
workflow_role.outputs: Raw parquet files organized by monitoring site

data_management.lifecycle: ephemeral - files moved to Archive after processing
data_management.preparation: Directory cleared before each data retrieval session
data_management.validation: Basic file creation and format validation only

file_naming_convention.description: Site identifier followed by ISO timestamp

file_formats: parquet - primary storage format for sensor measurements

data_structure.organization: one file per monitoring site per data retrieval session
data_structure.time_range: determined by api_start_dates table based on latest historical data

primary_processes: data preprocessing pipeline - reads data files

error_handling.empty_directory: pipeline stops with error if no files created after API retrieval
error_handling.existing_files: moved to archive before new data retrieval
error_handling.validation_failure: pipeline halts to prevent processing incomplete data
